rows.label: tlk70000027_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I worry about Prince Zettar. Not
that he does not possess talent...

rows.label: tlk70000027_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But he seems to use it
to serve only himself.

rows.label: tlk70000027_01_msg0003
rows.name:
He may think the people don't notice,
but they do. The soldiers too. That's
why they favor Prince Adel.

rows.label: tlk70000027_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If he could only see that
clearly and use his power to
help the inhabitants of Iira...
